reference.title: Return codes and reason codes
reference.shortdesc: Read the contained reference information that describes the return codes and reason codes reported at the conclusion of verb processing.

section.p: Reason code numbers narrow down the meaning of a return code. All reason code numbers are unique and associated with a single return code. Generally, you can base your application program design on the return codes.
Each verb supplies a return code and a reason code in the variables identified by the return_code and reason_code parameters. See .
